question: The Right to Free & Compulsory Education (RTE) Act, 2009 that was enacted in 2010 provides a justiciable legal framework for providing free and compulsory education to children in the age group of _?
explanation: The Right to Free & Compulsory Education (RTE) Act, 2009 that was enacted in 2010 provides a justiciable legal framework for providing free and compulsory education to children in the age group of 6-14. It provides for childrenâ€™s right to an education of equitable quality, based on principles of equity and non-discrimination as per Article 21a of the constitution.
